# userInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Instance Property**

The layout direction of the user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the general user interface layout flow directions. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection].

## User interface layout direction

- **NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection**: Specifies the directional flow of the user interface.
